metadata.dc:author: Márquez García, A
Chang Córdova, E
Martínez Vivas, A
Carranza Lira, S
Camarero García, A
metadata.dc:description: A case of periobstetric cardiomyopathy is presented, it was identified at 32 weeks, because of congestive cardiac failure, the obstetric event was resolved by cesarean section due to low fetal reserve, clinical and hemodynamical criteria for diagnosis are reviewed and also therapeutic alternatives are discussed.
metadata.dc:title: Miocardiopatía periparto. Informe de un caso, consideraciones diagnósticas y terapéuticas.
[Peripartum myocardiopathy. A case report, diagnostic and therapeutic considerations].
